name: Purpose
text:
PART II.  PLANNING COORDINATION AND IMPLEMENTATION

Note
  Part heading reenacted.  L 1991, c 76, pt of §1.
     The purpose of this part is to establish a statewide planning system to coordinate and guide all major state and county activities and to implement the overall theme, goals, objectives, policies, and priority guidelines. [L 1978, c 100, pt of §2; am L 1984, c 236, §3; ree L 1991, c 76, pt of §1]
